crisis.name: Chernobyl Accident
crisis.environmentalImpact: Up to 60 sq. mi. of farmland is likely to remain contaminated for decades
crisis.politicalChanges: Big impact on the fall of the USSR
crisis.regulatoryChanges: Tightening of nuclear power plant safety regulations

crisis.name: UT Tower Shooting
crisis.regulatoryChanges: Tower deck is closed due to safety regulations

crisis.name: BP Oil Spill
crisis.environmentalImpact: Wildlife was severely affected. The Gulf Coast's economic sectors were impacted such as offshore drilling, fishing, and tourism.
crisis.regulatoryChanges: Stricter regulatory control on oil companies to prevent future accidents. It also increased BP's financial responsibility for affected companies

crisis.name: Hurricane Ike
crisis.country: Haiti, USA, Bahamas, Cuba, Dominican Republic
crisis.environmentalImpact: There was significant property damage and flooding throughout all the affected areas
Buildings destroyed and harmful effects from the smoke in the air
crisis.politicalChanges: Creation of the Department of Homeland Security and Patriot Act
crisis.regulatoryChanges: Increased security measures put into place

crisis.name: Haiti Earthquake
crisis.environmentalImpact: Many buidlings destroyed and area not safe
crisis.regulatoryChanges: Food and water is sent still to Haiti for earthquake victims

crisis.name: 1900 Galveston Hurricane
crisis.politicalChanges: Galveston municipal government adopted a more centralized structure to deal with the storm aftermath.

crisis.name: Cuban Missile Crisis
crisis.politicalChanges: Big impact on the fall of the USSR

crisis.name: Cold War
crisis.politicalChanges: US as the sole superpower post World War II
crisis.culturalChanges: Fear and war orientate movies and tv programs

org.name: International Nuclear Safety Group (INSAG)
org.foundingMission: The group was founded in 1985 by the International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA) as an advisory committee in the area of nuclear safety.
org.majorEvents: First investigation was the Chernobyl Accident

org.name: Austin Police Department
org.foundingMission: To protect the safety and well being of the diverse Austin community
org.majorEvents: In 2000, ADP became the first agency in Texas to become nationally accredited by the Commission on Accreditation for Law Enforcement Agencies

org.name: BP
org.foundingMission: To provide energy to people around the world
org.majorEvents: It caused the BP oil spill, it was the first company to discover oil in the North Sea, and has become one of the top 6 oil and gas companies in the world.

org.name: Haitian Government
org.foundingMission: To provide an executive, legislative, and judicial system of government for the people of Haiti.
org.majorEvents: The National Palace was destroyed in the Haiti Earthquake.

org.name: Al-Qaeda
org.foundingMission: Al-Qaeda is a global militant Islamist and takfiri organization founded by Osama bin Laden in Peshawar, Pakistan, around August 1988.
org.majorEvents: Behind the 9-11 attacks and many other bombings

org.name: UNICEF
org.foundingMission: UNICEF was created by the United Nations General Assembly on December 11, 1946, to provide emergency food and healthcare to children in countries that had been devastated by World War II.
org.majorEvents: UNICEF was created by the United Nations General Assembly on December 11, 1946, to provide emergency food and healthcare to children in countries that had been devastated by World War II.

org.name: Johnson and Johnson
org.streetAddress: Johnson and Johnson, One Johnson and Johnson Plaza
org.foundingMission: Founded by brothers Robert Wood Johnson, James Wood Johnson, and Edward Mead Johnson in New Brunswick, New Jersey as a pharmaceuticals company.
org.majorEvents: First philanthropic gesture was donations to 1900 Galveston Hurricane victims.

org.name: Luftschiffbau Zeppelin
org.foundingMission: Count Ferdinand von Zeppelin gathered his staff to begin the production of giant "flying boats" making the town of Friedrichshafen a major aviation center.
org.majorEvents: In 1937, the Hindenburg disaster meant the end of an era for this company, which after the world wars has come back into the airship business.

org.name: Defense Intellegence Agency
org.foundingMission: DIA is first in all-source defense intellengece to prevent strategic surprise and deliver a decision advantage to warfighters, defense planners, and policymakers.
org.majorEvents: Failed to adequately act against one of the organizers of 9/11

org.name: United Nations
org.streetAddress: UN Headquarters First Avenue at 46th Street
org.foundingMission: To save succeeding generations from the scourge of war and to reaffirm faith in fundamental human rights.
org.majorEvents: Approving the creation of the state of Israel.

person.name: Richard A. Meserve
person.streetAddress: Carnegie Institution for Science, 1530 P Street Northwest
